text: tatha jab allaah (pralay ke din) kahegaah he maryam ke putr eesa! kya tumane logon se kaha tha ki allaah ko chhodakar mujhe tatha meree maata ko poojy (aaraadhy) bana lo? vah kahegaah too pavitr hai, mujhase ye kaise ho sakata hai ki aisee baat kahoon, jisaka mujhe koee adhikaar nahin? yadi mainne kaha hoga, to tujhe avashy usaka gyaan hua hoga. too mere man kee baat jaanata hai aur main tere man kee baat nahin jaanata. vaastav mein, too hee paroksh (gaib) ka ati gyaanee hai
